title: Maruti Suzuki hikes prices of Swift and Grand Vitara variants
description: Maruti Suzuki increased prices for its hatchback Swift and certain variants of its SUV Grand Vitara. The Swift saw a hike of up to Rs 25,000, while only the Sigma variant of the Grand Vitara rose by Rs 19,000. This follows Maruti's previous hike in January, mirroring similar moves by other automakers due to rising input costs.
